argument.command:
#!/usr/bin/env ruby

termchar = ";"
if ENV['TM_LINE_TERMINATOR']
	termchar = ENV['TM_LINE_TERMINATOR']
end

# short for escape_snippet - escapes special snippet characters in str
def es(str)
	str.to_s.gsub(/([$`\\])/, "\\\\\\1")
end

print es($stdin.read()[/^(.*?);*\s*$/, 1]) + "#{es(termchar)}$0"
